title: "Plinth" means the portion of a structure between the surface of the surrounding ground and surface of the floor immediately above the ground or basement or any storey level
clause_text: "Plinth" means the portion of a structure between the surface of the surrounding ground and surface of the floor immediately above the ground or basement or any storey level. "Plinth area" means the built-up covered area measured at the plinth level.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "Plinth" means the portion of a structure between the surface of the surrounding ground and surface of the floor immediately above the ground or basement or any storey level.
